name: Jump switch
description:
Game feedback forum - https://forms.gle/wpYXhekDJKrmACRP9

Jump Switch is a single-player platformer where whenever you jump the platformers you can touch change. Solve puzzles jump around and try to beat all the levels.

The game currently has only 7 levels but, the team has the challenge to finish it in 100 days, which ends in 77 days.

Please comment on how you think the music fits with the game you can see which version a the title screen.
